00038 void RequestHandlerPread::run() {
00039   ResponseCallbackRead cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->message_len - 2;
00041   const uint8_t *msg = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00042 
00043   try {
00044     uint32_t fd = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00045     uint64_t offset = decode_i64(&msg, &remaining);
00046     uint32_t amount = decode_i32(&msg, &remaining);
00047 
00048     m_broker->pread(&cb, fd, offset, amount);
00049   }
00050   catch (Exception &e) {
00051     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00052     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling PREAD message");
00053   }
00054 }
